about_the_game:
OVERVIEW


Orbisia is an open-world survival crafting game.
You have to work with your team members to explore and survive the wide and beautiful world.
Enjoy a free world by gathering and hunting for survival!
But there are so many things to be careful about for survival.
Be prepared to survive unknown threats and sudden situations sometimes!

GamePlay


The ORBISIA world is a world where numerous games coexist.
The world with different worldviews sometimes collides and is in danger.
At this time, there are people to keep the world balanced.
They are always ready for every situation.
But they sometimes make mistakes, too.
One day, their spacecraft, which was hit by a digital storm due to a crack in the world crash, crashed into an unknown world.
Their spacecraft is broken and they have lost all their food, so they are in a crisis.
They have to survive in a cracked world and collect, produce, and grow resources to prevent cracks in the world.
But in order to grow, you have to survive first!

GAME FEATURES

Characteristics
Enjoy it alone or with friends.
Failure to survive can lead to loss of everything. Always focus on survival.

Production and cooking.
In order to survive, you need to make various tools!
What kind of food will come out if I mix all the ingredients?

Architecture
There are monsters in the world that threaten players. I'll hide myself from them.
Create a shelter to protect you from disasters!

Skill and stators.
Everything the players do affects the character.
What kind of skills do you want to improve?
